name: Submit feedback when reservation status is In Progress
fullName: Feedback API Scenarios: Submit feedback when reservation status is In Progress
description:
As a customer
  I want to submit and view feedback based on reservation status
  So that I can share my dining experience
descriptionHtml:
As a customer
I want to submit and view feedback based on reservation status
So that I can share my dining experience

steps.name: Given  reservation with ID "2b33dde7" is in status "In Progress"
When  the user submits feedback with cuisine rating "5" and service rating "4"
Then  the response status code should be 200
